java/liquibase/preconditions/OrPrecondition.java

00001 package liquibase.preconditions;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.DatabaseChangeLog;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.PreconditionFailedException;
00006 
00007 import java.util.ArrayList;
00008 import java.util.List;
00009 
00013 public class OrPrecondition extends PreconditionLogic {
00014 
00015 
00016     public void check(Database database, DatabaseChangeLog changeLog) throws PreconditionFailedException {
00017         boolean onePassed = false;
00018         List<FailedPrecondition> failures = new ArrayList<FailedPrecondition>();
00019         for (Precondition precondition : getNestedPreconditions()) {
00020             try {
00021                 precondition.check(database, changeLog);
00022                 onePassed = true;
00023             } catch (PreconditionFailedException e) {
00024                 failures.addAll(e.getFailedPreconditions());
00025             }
00026         }
00027         if (!onePassed) {
00028             throw new PreconditionFailedException(failures);
00029         }
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getTagName() {
00033         return "or";
00034     }
00035 }
